verses.verse: Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> was <S%H935>coming,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with him. So he <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>maids.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H8198>maids<s%> and their <S%H3206>children<s%> in <S%H7223>front,<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> and her <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H314>next,<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H314>last.<s%>

But he <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> on <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of them and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to his <S%H251>brother.<s%>
Then <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> him, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6677>neck<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him, and they <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H3206>children,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> with you?" So he <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2603>graciously<s%> <S%H2603>given<s%> your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"
Then the <S%H8198>maids<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> with their <S%H3206>children,<s%> and they <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down.<s%>

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> with her <S%H3206>children,<s%> and they <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> with <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and they <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"What<s%> do you mean by <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4264>company<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6298>met<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "To <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%> "
But <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H7227>plenty,<s%> my <S%H251>brother;<s%> let <S%H834>what<s%> you <S%H1961>have<s%> be your own."

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H408>"No,<s%> <S%H4994>please,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> then <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H4503>present<s%> from my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> for I <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> as one <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and you have <S%H7521>received<s%> me <S%H7521>favorably.<s%>

<S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H1293>gift<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has been <S%H935>brought<s%> to you, <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2603>dealt<s%> <S%H2603>graciously<s%> with me, and <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H3605>plenty.<s%>" Thus he <S%H6484>urged<s%> him and he <S%H3947>took<s%> [it.]
Then Esau <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us <S%H5265>take<s%> our <S%H5265>journey<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> and I will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you."

But he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that the <S%H3206>children<s%> are <S%H7390>frail<s%> and that the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> which are <S%H5763>nursing<s%> are a <S%H5921>care<s%> to me. And if they are <S%H1849>driven<s%> <S%H1849>hard<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> will <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H4994>"Please<s%> let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and I will <S%H5095>proceed<s%> at my <S%H328>leisure,<s%> according to the <S%H7272>pace<s%> of the <S%H4399>cattle<s%> that are <S%H6440>before<s%> me and according to the <S%H7272>pace<s%> of the <S%H3206>children,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> at <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>"

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let me <S%H3322>leave<s%> with you <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with me." But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> need is there? Let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>"
So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth;<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> for himself a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5521>booths<s%> for his <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>

Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8003>safely<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> from Paddan-aram, and <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And he <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H2513>piece<s%> of <S%H2513>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor,<s%> Shechem's father, for one <S%H1>hundred<s%> <S%H3967>pieces<s%> of <S%H7192>money.<s%>
Then he <S%H5324>erected<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it El-Elohe-Israel.
